posts.post_content: Looking for an Addie Joss Portrait (love the CLEVELAND across the chest; GO TRIBE) or a any T206 Nap Lajoie. Preferably SGC graded. Trying to spend no more than $100.

I just finished the Naps team set, meaning I've got all the players, but not all the variations of the players.  From Cleveland originally.  Go Tribe!

ROLL TRIBE! BEAT CANADA!
